title: History Meets Modern Style in One of Istanbul’s Most Vibrant Districts
description: Absolutely steeped in history, the Turkish city of Istanbul is a mesmerising city of soaring domes and minarets, bustling bazaars, exquisite architecture and artistic treasures. Immerse yourself in it all, staying in boutique luxury in one of the city’s most hip and happening districts at 10 Karaköy, a historic 18th century hotel with a rooftop bar. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, a delicious three-course dining experience at Bahane On 10 and a complimentary welcome drink on arrival - your choice of a cocktail, wine or soft drink.
offer_address: Müeyyedzade Mahallesi, Kemeraltı Cd. No:10, 34425 Karaköy / Beyoğlu/Beyoğlu/İstanbul, Turkey

vendor_name: Grand Tarabya Istanbul - Managed by Accor
title: Istanbul Opulence Overlooking the Bosphorus Strait with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Discover timeless elegance on the Bosphorus Strait at this storied five-star retreat, gracefully set in Istanbul’s prestigious Tarabya district, along European shores. From marina-view rooms to the hotel’s five eateries, sweeping vistas of Tarabya Bay unfold - a scene of elegant mansions, sailing boats and seagulls tracing the sky above the harbour.

Unwind at Therapia Spa, one of Istanbul’s largest wellness sanctuaries. Facilities include steam and sauna rooms, indoor and outdoor seawater pools and a suite of treatment spaces. A state-of-the-art fitness centre and dedicated pilates studio make it easy to stay on track, even while away.

Indulge in elevated dining at The Brasserie, a traditional afternoon tea at the T Lounge, or laid-back alfresco bites at R.E.A.D Bistro & Café. Diba Bar offers the perfect vantage point to watch the sunset transform into a glittering harbourfront, while Pool Bar serves a refreshing menu.
offer_address: Tarabya, Haydar Aliyev, No:154, Istanbul 34457, Türkiye

title: Iconic Shangri-La Luxury in Istanbul with Indulgent Dining Inclusions
description: Steeped in history, Istanbul is a mesmerising city brimming with soaring domes and minarets, bustling bazaars, exquisite architecture and artistic treasures. Immerse yourself in it all, staying in five-star luxury at the lavish Shangri-La Bosphorus, housed in a beautifully restored heritage building dating back to the 1930s and ideally located in the up-and-coming district of Besiktas. Your luxe escape includes daily breakfast, a one-time decadent high tea, a three-course set-menu dinner at IST TOO restaurant once during your stay, and a 25% discount on spa treatments and on food and drinks at Shang Palace, the hotel's renowned Chinese restaurant.
offer_address: Sinanpaşa, Hayrettin İskelesi Sk. D:No.1, 34353 Beşiktaş/İstanbul, Turkey

title: Luxury Istanbul Swissôtel Escape along the Bosphorus River with Rooftop Bar & Daily Breakfast
description: Experience the alluring grandeur of Istanbul at this sophisticated five-star sanctuary, majestically perched on the European banks of the Bosphorus. Nestled within 65 acres of historical gardens, the hotel is set in the heart of the transcontinental city and boasts elegant rooms, two pools, a breathtaking rooftop bar and Pürovel Spa & Sport, offering holistic spa treatments. For the gourmands, it's a true Turkish delight - sample cuisines from around the world, ranging from Peruvian and Turkish to Alpine and Indian, across the hotel's six onsite restaurants and bars.
offer_address: Vişnezade Mahallesi, Acısu Sokaği 19, Besiktas, Istanbul 34357, Türkiye

title: Five-Star Istanbul Opulence near Galata Tower with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Dining Credit
description:
Lose yourself in the romance of Istanbul from this glamorous sanctuary. Cradled in the heart of lively Beyoglu, you're just steps from historic Taksim Square and the shopping paradise of Istiklal Street. Step behind the hotel's ornate facade and you'll be greeted by 19th-century neoclassical architecture, vintage chandeliers and refined interiors that echo the charm of its eclectic surrounds.

Savour authentic mezzes and Turkish kebaps at Kevok, global flavours at Chapelle Restaurant and sample Pera's unique culinary offerings at Cafe Royal. Then, soak up mesmerising sunsets over the Golden Horn waterways while sipping on hand-crafted cocktails from the Era Rooftop.

After wandering along the city's byzantine alleys and exploring the nearby Galata Tower, unwind with soothing rituals and hammam baths at the Anjana Spa by Rixos.
offer_address: Kamerhatun, Meşrutiyet Cd. No:44, 34435 Beyoğlu/İstanbul, Türkiye

title: Five-Star Istanbul Fairmont Opulence with Five Restaurants & Turkish Hamman
description:
Experience contemporary grandeur in the heart of Istanbul’s vibrant Mecidiyeköy district, where panoramic Bosphorus views meet striking modern design. Just steps away, explore the fashionable boutiques and buzzing cafes of Nişantaşı, or wander through the ancient streets of Beşiktaş, home to the Dolmabahçe Palace and bustling fish markets.

Savour Anatolian-inspired cuisine at Aila, where a dramatic spice library sets the scene, or enjoy artisanal pastries and Turkish coffee at Demlique. Admire sweeping city vistas across to the Bosphorous before retreating down to the Fairmont Spa which features a traditional hammam and tranquil treatment rooms.
offer_address: Buyukdere Caddesi No 76, Mecidiyekoy, ISTANBUL, TURKEY, TURKEY, 34393

title: Modern Istanbul Escape near Taksim Square with Turkish Hammam
description: The magic of Istanbul must be seen to be believed - its centuries-old wonders and rich cultural traditions at your fingertips when you stay at the Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Harbiye. Just 20 minutes from Taksim Square and two stops on the Metro to the 14th-century Galata Tower, this hotel is perfectly placed for discovering the Turkish capital's history. Experience a Turkish hammam at the onsite spa or indulge in authentic local cuisine at Ege Restaurant and İstisna Restaurant.
offer_address: Bozkurt, Dolapdere Caddesi. No:161 Şişli, İstanbul 34375, Turkiye

title: Istanbul Oceanview Escape with Panoramic Restaurant
description: Take a break from the everyday and lose yourself in the wonders of Istanbul when you stay at Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Florya, an IHG Hotel. In between daily excursions, stay in and enjoy a refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor swimming pools, treat yourself to some pampering at the spa, and take in sparkling ocean views from the roof terrace with a drink in hand. When hunger strikes, be wined and dined alongside ocean panoramas and live music at Atrox Bar & Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Florya, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Yesilkoy Halkali Caddesi No: 95, Istanbul, 34153, Turkey

title: Boutique Vakko Istanbul Escape in Sophisticated Nisantasi
description: At the border between Nisantasi’s cream-hued historic palaces, galleries and luxury boutiques and the Bosporus Strait's brilliant blues, Vakko Hotel & Residence has set the new standard for sumptuous five-star boutique luxury, backed by Turkiye’s most iconic fashion house. Drawing on Vakko’s powerful reputation for incomparable quality and timeless design, each of the hotel’s 31 apartment-style suites features everything the discerning traveller needs for an unforgettable Istanbul escape, including spacious living areas, fully equipped kitchens and around-the-clock butler service. Spend afternoons savouring chocolate delights and pistachio-stuffed pastries at Vakko L’Atelier or enjoy an unparalleled tailoring service at Vakko’s own flagship store, located on hotel’s ground floor.
offer_address: Harbiye, Abdi Ipekci Cd. No. 43, 34367 Istanbul, Turkiye

title: Modern Istanbul Escape Overlooking the Bosphorus Strait
description: Signature five-star luxury awaits at the opulent InterContinental Istanbul, an IHG Hotel - the ultimate base to explore the Ottoman capital. Treat yourself to the splendour of an expansive swimming pool, state-of-the-art fitness centre and Spa InterContinental. During your stay, indulge in award-winning dining at Safran Restaurant and Lobby Terrace & Amandine Patisserie, or unwind with a cocktail or tapas at the City Lights Bar and Pool Bar.
offer_address: Asker Ocagi Caddesi No. 1, Taksim, Istanbul, 34435, Turkiye

vendor_name: The Artisan Hotel Istanbul - MGallery Collection
title: Istanbul Landmark Retreat Overlooking Bosphorus Strait with Onsite Restaurant & Spa
description:
Nestled in the heart of Istanbul where East embraces West, The Artisan Istanbul is your front-row ticket to Bosphorus Strait views and the city's soul. The rooftop terrace serves up views of minarets piercing the sky, while Spa Soul will melt away your jet lag. Sink into cloud-like beds after wandering cobblestone streets, or mingle with fellow travellers in Art&Kitchen lobby bistro.

A stone's throw from the Grand Bazaar and Hagia Sophia, you'll be living like a local before you know it. Duck into courtyard cafes for Turkish coffee that'll knock your socks off, or ask the concierge for insider tips to uncover authentic Istanbul. Come see what all the fuss is about.
location_description: The Artisan Hotel Istanbul - MGallery Collection
offer_address: Omer Avni Mah Inonu Caddesi, No. 42 Gumussuyu Beyoglu, Istanbul 34437, Turkey

title: Istanbul 1920s Shangri-La Heritage Stay on the Bosphorus Strait
description: Immerse yourself in Istanbul's wonders with a stay in five-star luxury at the lavish Shangri-La Bosphorus, Istanbul housed in a beautifully restored 1920s heritage building, ideally located in the up-and-coming district of Beşiktaş. Luxury comes in the form of chandelier-clad ceilings and Ottoman-inspired glamour, four incredible restaurants and bars, and a heavenly day spa where you can indulge in a traditional hammam experience. Commanding the strait’s waterfront and positioned steps from all that the vibrant district of Beşiktaş has to offer - from restaurants, bars and galleries to the superb Maritime Museum - this is the ultimate base for your Turkey adventures.
offer_address: Sinanpasa Mah, Hayrettin Iskelesi Sok, No.1, Besiktas, Istanbul 34353 Turkey

title: Stylish Istanbul Escape with Indoor Swimming Pool
description: The intrigue of Istanbul beckons visitors from across the globe - discover the city's wonders for yourself with a stay at the Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Oryapark, an IHG Hotel. During your stay, take a cooling dip in the indoor swimming pool, keep up with your fitness regime at the fitness centre, or enjoy a pampering treatment at the spa. For dinner, feast on authentic Turkish fare at Oval Restaurant or cap off your evening with a tipple or two at the suave lobby bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Oryapark, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: In Inkilap Mahallesi Kucuksu Caddesi, No:58 Umraniye, 34768, Istanbul, Turkiye

title: Elegant Istanbul Bosphorus Coast Escape 15 Minutes from the Grand Bazaar with Spa & Rooftop Dining
description: Ideally located right by iconic Bosphorus Bridge, this elegant hotel will plunge you into sophisticated modernism, with Istanbul's inspiring architecture, culture, history and cuisine right on your doorstep - the bustling Grand Bazaar and striking Hagia Sofia are just a 15-minute drive away. Take in sweeping views of the city from the rooftop restaurant, or relax and unwind at the hotel's Sanitas Spa before exploring all the city has to offer.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Ortakoy Bosphorus, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Dereboyu Caddesi. No. 10, 34347 Beşiktaş, Istanbul, 34347, Turkiye

title: Glamorous Istanbul Raffles Opulence with Two Restaurants, Speakeasy-Style Bar & Luxe Spa
description:
Where East meets West in spectacular style, this five-star Istanbul icon sits high above the Bosphorus in transcontinental Turkey's chic Zorlu Centre. Expect sleek architecture, curated Turkish art accents, spacious rooms and suites with floor-to-ceiling windows that frame the city like a painting, all enhanced by round-the-clock dedicated butler service.

Dining is a grand affair here: savour creative Asian fusion fare at İsokyo, sip on expertly-crafted cocktails from Long Bar and indulge in a literature-inspired speakeasy experience at Writers Bar. After a day of cultural discovery, unwind in the resort's highly acclaimed, expansive spa, boasting traditional hammams, vitality pools and serene treatment rooms.
offer_address: Zorlu Center Vadi Caddesi, Zorlu Center, Istanbul, Turkey, 34340

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Istanbul Tuzla Viaport Marina
title: Sophisticated Seafront Resort Just an Hour from Istanbul
description: Discover Turkiye's legendary culture, history and cuisine with a sophisticated stay at the Crowne Plaza Istanbul Tuzla Viaport Marina, an IHG Hotel, your gateway to vibrant Istanbul. This eye-catching hotel is built on a private man-made island in the centre of Viaport Marina, an hour from the city centre. Find yourself surrounded by the amazing landmarks, monuments and architecture of this unique metropolis, while your peaceful hotel offers calming water views and authentic Turkish flavours.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Istanbul Tuzla Viaport Marina, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Cami Mh. Balikcilar Sokak U Blok 20, Istanbul 34940, Turkiye

title: Five-Star Kempinski Istanbul Palace Stay with Breathtaking Bosphorus Strait Views
description: Enjoy a unique stay in the only Ottoman Imperial palace and hotel on the Bosphorus, the Çırağan Palace Kempinski Istanbul. This five-star escape is perched on the banks of the Bosphorus Strait and offers spellbinding ocean views from almost every vantage. Fine dining is a celebrated affair at the hotel's seven restaurants and bars: sip handcrafted cocktails in Le Fumoir, feast on Italian classics in Bellini Pasta & More and brunch in the 17th-century gardens at Lalefan Restaurant. Between gastronomic delights, experience an authentic Turkish bathing experience in the palatial Sanitas Spa and take a dip in the mirror-like infinity pool boasting views across the Bosphorus.
offer_address: Ciragan Caddesi 32, 34349 Istanbul, Turkey

title: Lavish Istanbul Retreat with Two Onsite Swimming Pools
description: Get a taste of authentic Turkey with a stay at the lavish Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Asia, an IHG Hotel, your gateway to the rich experiences of Istanbul. This vibrant metropolis poised at the intersection of two continents has long been a meeting place of cultures, as its incredibly traditions, cuisines and monuments attest. Spend your days exploring this intriguing city before returning to this opulent hotel to escape the heat with a dip in either of the two onsite pools.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Asia, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Yenisehir Mah. Dedepasa Cad. No. 15 Kurtkoy- Pendik Istanbul, 34912, Turkey

title: Raffles Istanbul LE+ and LPC TV Show
description: x
offer_address: Levazım, Vadi Caddesi - Zorlu Center, 34340 Beşiktaş/Istanbul, Turkey

title: French-Inspired Istanbul Glamour near Taksim Square with Rooftop Pool, Restaurant & Spa
description:
Discover the perfect blend of timeless Ottoman charm and classic French elegance at this five-star Sofitel sanctuary, just a stone's throw from vibrant Taksim Square. With convenient access to the metro and the historic tram, Istanbul's cultural treasures - including the Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Galata Tower - are all within easy reach.

After a day exploring Istanbul's grand bazaars, ancient mosques and bustling streets, refresh with a dip in the rooftop pool or book a rejuvenating hammam session at Sofitel SPA. When hunger strikes, savour Mediterranean-Turkish fare in a chic, glass-walled setting at The Oven Brasserie & Terrace or toast to the day's adventures with a drink at the elegant lobby bar.
offer_address: Gumussuyu Mah, Siraselviler Cad No. 13, Taksim, Istanbul 34437, Turkey

title: Istanbul Five-Star Heritage Mansion Escape on the Banks of the Bosphorus Strait
description: Fashion and fabulous facilities come together at the five-star Six Senses Kocataş Mansions, a heritage property overlooking the sailboat-studded Bosphorus Strait. Be wined and dined at the hotel's five restaurants, including an onsite patisserie serving up freshly baked pastries, croissants and Turkish coffee. The wellness spa, located across three levels in a 100-year-old stone house, is your go-to for pampering bliss. Indulge in a traditional Turkish hammam, a dip in the infinity pool overlooking the Bosphorus Strait or a range of deeply relaxing massages. When you're ready to venture outside, wander 10 minutes along the banks of the Bosphorus to Sariyer, Istanbul's northernmost district, home to seafood restaurants and the Sadberk Hanim Museum.
offer_address: Merkez Mahallesi Meserburnu Caddesi, No: 5 Sarıyer, Istanbul, 34450 Turkey

title: Istanbul Old City Heritage Stay near Laleli Mosque
description: At the heart of a transcontinental city with a storied past, the Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Old City, an IHG Hotel, is a luxurious refuge for travellers looking to traverse Turkiye. Visit heritage sites to observe Byzantine architecture or hunt for treasures in the captivating Grand Bazaar. On your return, devour authentic Turkish cuisine at Lale Restaurant or a sweet treat from Cafe Sacez before exploring this magical metropolis by night or retiring to a sumptuous guest room for a well-earned rest.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Istanbul - Old City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Balabanaga, Fethi Bey Cad No 2, 34134 Fatih, Istanbul, Turkiye
